name: Impatient Patients
description:
In this game, you are a doctor at a hospital. Everyone has an important surgery that needs to be done, and you need to decide which one is more important than the others. In surgery, you have to complete the right procedure. If you kill a patient in surgery, you lose 3 lives, if a patient dies in the waiting room, you lose 2 lives, if you successfully treat a patient, you gain a life. You have 20 lives to lose before you are fired. Your score is how many patients you successfully treat total. Good Luck Doc!

Controls:

Move: WASD or Arrow Keys

Interact: Space

End Interact: Enter

Grab Surgery Tool: Click

Grab Organ: Drag with Tweezer

Cut: Drag with Scalpel
